com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api.spreadsheet.model

Interface IWorkbook


  • public interface IWorkbook
    Represents a SCell Workbook model and starts the API entry point

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWorksheet add()
      Creates and adds a worksheet to the workbook
      IWorksheet addCopy(int originId)
      Copies the existing worksheet and adds it to the workbook
      Stream<IWorksheet> all() 
      IWorkbook createCopy()
      Creates a new IWorkbook with copy all the data from current this
      Optional<IWorksheet> find(int id)
      Searches the worksheet by the ID
      Optional<IWorksheet> find(String name)
      Searches the worksheet by the name
      com.intechcore.scomponents.common.core.event.manager.IEventManager getEventManager() 
      IWorksheet getFirst() 
      IFormulasService getFormulasService() 
      IScellApiResolver getResolver() 
      ISearchService getSearchService() 
      IFileWriter getWriter() 
      Boolean remove(int id)
      Removes the worksheet
      IWorksheet removeAll()
      Removes all worksheets and adds a new one (since the workbook must contain at least one worksheet)
      void setProtection(IPasswordInput passwordHandler)
      Protects or (when the param is null) does not protect the current document.

    • Method Detail

      • getWriter

        IFileWriter getWriter()
        Returns:
        IFileWriter to save or convert the xlsx

      • add

        IWorksheet add()
        Creates and adds a worksheet to the workbook
        Returns:
        the created IWorksheet

      • addCopy

        IWorksheet addCopy(int originId)
        Copies the existing worksheet and adds it to the workbook
        Parameters:
        originId - the worksheet id to be copied
        Returns:
        the created IWorksheet

      • createCopy

        IWorkbook createCopy()
        Creates a new IWorkbook with copy all the data from current this
        Returns:
        the new IWorkbook

      • remove

        Boolean remove(int id)
        Removes the worksheet
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the worksheet to be removed
        Returns:
        true if worksheet existed and was deleted, otherwise false

      • removeAll

        IWorksheet removeAll()
        Removes all worksheets and adds a new one (since the workbook must contain at least one worksheet)
        Returns:
        the newly created IWorksheet

      • getSearchService

        ISearchService getSearchService()
        Returns:
        ISearchService to find any content in the Workbook

      • getFirst

        IWorksheet getFirst()
        Returns:
        the first IWorksheet of the workbook

      • find

        Optional<IWorksheet> find(int id)
        Searches the worksheet by the ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the required worksheet (integer)
        Returns:
        the found IWorksheet or Optional.empty()

      • find

        Optional<IWorksheet> find(String name)
        Searches the worksheet by the name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the required worksheet
        Returns:
        the found IWorksheet or Optional.empty()

      • all

        Stream<IWorksheet> all()
        Returns:
        all worksheets of the workbook
        See Also:
        IWorksheet

      • getEventManager

        com.intechcore.scomponents.common.core.event.manager.IEventManager getEventManager()
        Returns:
        the current IEventManager to manage the internal events

      • getResolver

        IScellApiResolver getResolver()
        Returns:
        IScellApiResolver for convenience

      • setProtection

        void setProtection(IPasswordInput passwordHandler)
        Protects or (when the param is null) does not protect the current document. In addition to this the file will be encrypted (or will not) with the provided password
        Parameters:
        passwordHandler - the password supplier. To remove the existing protection set the param to null

      • getFormulasService

        IFormulasService getFormulasService()
        Returns:
        the formula service for managing formulas calculation
